question: "Operation Sard Hawa", which was making news recently, was organised by which organisation?
explanation:
Border Security Force (BSF) organises the Operation "Garam Hawa" in summer season and operation "Sard Hawa" during the winter season every year.
BSF has recently launched "Operation Sard Hawa" of this year, under which it aims to increase security on the borders in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. This operation was scheduled from January 21 to 27, coinciding with the Republic Day.
